contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of October, 1997, there having been filed with this Court by Linda Marie Gross her verified Statement of Resignation dated September 25, 1997, stating that she desires to resign from the bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania in accordance with the provisions of Rule 215, Pa.R.D.E., it is
ORDERED that the resignation of Linda Marie Gross be and it is hereby accepted and she is DISBARRED ON CONSENT from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; and it is further ORDERED that she shall comply with the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E. Respondent shall pay costs, if any, to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
